title: Highest GNI per capita
description: In 2015, Liechtenstein had the highest GNI per capita in the world, reaching $137,688.92 (constant 2015 US$).

title: Lowest pupil-teacher ratio in lower secondary education
description: In 2017, Liechtenstein had the lowest pupil-teacher ratio in lower secondary education globally, with only 5.6 students per teacher.

title: Highest political stability
description: In 2023, Liechtenstein ranked among the highest in political stability and absence of violence, with a percentile rank of 94.79.

title: Most researchers in R&D per capita
description: In 2023, Liechtenstein had the highest number of researchers in R&D per million people, with 18,129.75 researchers.

title: Lowest foreign direct investment inflows
description: In 2018, Liechtenstein had the lowest foreign direct investment net inflows as a percentage of GDP, at -1303.11%.
